1.name: Zero to Hero
1.objective: Survive a raid starting only with your knife.

2.name: Friday the 13th
2.objective: Eliminate at least 1 PMC with a Jason Mask and your knife.

3.name: Zero to Hero - Hardcore
3.objective: Survive a raid starting with absolutely nothing.

4.name: Escape from Tarkov
4.objective: Survive a full marathon playthrough starting from Ground Zero and extracting on Shoreline.

5.name: Escape from Tarkov - Hardcore
5.objective: Survive a full marathon playthrough starting from Ground Zero and extracting on Shoreline.  Your only starting equipment is your knife.

6.name: Definitely Not a Scav
6.objective: Disguise yourself as a scav, infiltrate, and eliminate other scavs.

7.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
7.objective: Survive a raid using only revolver type weapons.

8.name: One in the Chamber
8.objective: Survive a raid using only the MP18 OR any rifle WITHOUT magazines.

9.name: Power of the Sun
9.objective: Run an AR or shotgun with the maximum amount of flashlight attachments.

10.name: Heavy Metal
10.objective: Survive a raid using a Machine gun while wearing the Zabrallo and an Altyn.

11.name: Lending a Hand
11.objective: Stash your kit (valued at least 300k roubles) in any large technical crate and extract.

12.name: Kill 'em All
12.objective: Survive a raid while using Killa's loadout - helmet, armor, and the RPK.

13.name: Gold Plated
13.objective: Survive using only the gold plated PM pistol.

14.name: Desert Eagle POINT FIVE OH
14.objective: Survive a raid using only the Desert Eagle.

15.name: Rolling Thunder
15.objective: Bring in and use at least 20+ grenades.

16.name: The One
16.objective: Fill your tatical rig with pistols/smgs to use while in raid.  No reloading.

17.name: Rat Catcher
17.objective: Eliminate campers at the D2 extraction on Reserve.

18.name: Partizan Protege
18.objective: Survive a raid while wearing a beard, beanie, and Partizan's backpack.  Get at least 1 PMC with tripwire grenades.

19.name: Weapon Handling
19.objective: Survive a raid while running any Assualt Rifle WITHOUT modifications.

20.name: Controlled Distruction
20.objective: Get at least 3 PMC kills with the rotary Grenade Launcher.

21.name: Over Exposure
21.objective: Elimate at least 3 PMCs that have been blinded by the KS-23 flash rounds.

22.name: Last Resort
22.objective: Survive a raid unsing only the Toz shotgun.

23.name: Designated Smoking Area
23.objective: Elimate at least 1 PMC whiled concealed by smoke.

24.name: Danger Close
24.objective: Eliminate at least 3 PMCs while using either a Shotgun or SMG.  No armor allowed.

25.name: Lumberjack
25.objective: Survive a raid using only the Glock 18 with RIP rounds.

27.name: Fight Against the Darkness
27.objective: Survive a nighttime raid with your flashlight on at all times.  No NVGs.

28.name: Fence Partnership
28.objective: Eliminate at least 3 PMCs using a loudout purchased from Fence.
